name: Abomination
description: "\"Foolish rabble! You are beneath me!\"",
chinese_description: “愚蠢的杂碎！屈服于我！”

name: Absorbing Man
description: "On Reveal: If the last card you played has an On Reveal, copy its text. (if it's in play)",
chinese_description: 揭示：若你放置的上张卡牌有揭示效果，复制其卡面文字。（若该卡牌在场上已揭示）

name: Adam Warlock
description: "After each turn, draw a card if you're winning here.",
chinese_description: 每回合结束后，若你在此区域领先，抽1张牌。

name: Aero
description: "On Reveal: Move the last enemy card played anywhere to this location.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将放置的上一张敌方卡牌，从任一区域移动至此区域。

name: Agatha Harkness
description: "Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.",
chinese_description: 阿加莎会出现在你的起始手牌中，并帮你出牌。

name: Agent 13
description: "On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：随机将1张卡牌添加到你的手牌。

name: Agent Coulson
description: "On Reveal: Add a random {card.TokenEnergyCost_1}-Cost and {card.TokenEnergyCost_2}-Cost card to your hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：随机将初始能量消耗为4和5的卡牌各1张添加到手牌。

name: America Chavez
description: "On Reveal: Give the top card of your deck +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：使你卡组中最上方的卡牌战力+2。

name: Angel
description: "When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your hand or deck to replace it.",
chinese_description: 当你的1张卡牌被删去后，此牌会从手牌或卡组飞出并替换那张卡牌。

name: Angela
description: "After you play a card here,\n+{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 当你在此区域放置1张卡牌后，战力+2。

name: Ant Man
description: "Ongoing: If your side of this location is full, +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 持续：若你已填满此区域，战力+4。

name: Apocalypse
description: "When you discard this, put it back with +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 当你丢弃此牌时，此牌战力+4并回到手牌中。

name: Armor
description: "Ongoing: Cards here can't\nbe destroyed.",
chinese_description: 持续：此区域中的卡牌不能被删去。

name: Arnim Zola
description: "On Reveal: Destroy one of your\nother cards here to copy it\nat the other locations.",
chinese_description: 揭示：删去此区域中1张友方卡牌，然后在其他各区域添加1张它的复制牌。

name: Attuma
description: "After each turn, destroy this if you have another card here.",
chinese_description: 每回合结束后，删去此区域1张战力小于此牌的友方卡牌。

name: Baron Mordo
description: "On Reveal: The top card of your opponent's deck costs {card.AssignedCost} until turn {card.TurnNumber}.",
chinese_description: 揭示：使对手卡组最上方卡牌的能量消耗在第6回合前变为6。

name: Bast
description: "On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your hand to {card.AssignedPower}.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将你所有手牌的战力变为3。

name: Beast
description: "On Reveal: Return your other cards here to your hand. They cost {card.ReducedCost} less next turn.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将你在此牌所在区域的其他卡牌退回手牌，它们在下回合能量消耗-1。

name: Bishop
description: "After you play a card, this gains +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 你放置1张卡牌后，此卡牌战力+1。

name: Black Bolt
description: "On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your opponent's hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：丢弃对手手牌中能量消耗最低的1张卡牌。

name: Black Cat
description: "If this is in your hand after the turn, discard it.",
chinese_description: 回合结束后，若此牌仍在你的手牌中，则丢弃它。

name: Black Panther
description: "On Reveal: Double this\ncard's Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：此卡牌战力翻倍。

name: Black Widow
description: "On Reveal: Add a {card.Card_Token.Name} to your opponent's hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将1张寡妇蜇添加到对手手牌。

name: Blade
description: "On Reveal: Discard the rightmost card from your hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：丢弃最右侧的1张手牌。

name: Blue Marvel
description: "Ongoing: Your other cards have +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 持续：你所有的其他卡牌战力+1。

name: Brood
description: "On Reveal: Add {card.TokenCount} Broodlings here with the same Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：在此区域添加2张战力与之相同的布鲁德虫。

name: Bucky Barnes
description: "When this is destroyed, replace it with the {card.Card_Token.Name}.",
chinese_description: 被删去时，此卡牌会被替换为冬兵。

name: Cable
description: "On Reveal: Draw a card from your opponent's deck.",
chinese_description: 揭示：抽取对手卡组中的1张卡牌。

name: Captain America
description: Ongoing: Your other Ongoing cards here have +2 Power.
chinese_description: 持续：你在此区域的其他持续卡牌战力+2。

name: Captain Marvel
description: "At the end of the game, move to a location that wins you the\ngame. (If possible)",
chinese_description: 此牌会在本局对战结束时移动到能为你赢下对战的区域（若能赢的话）。

name: Carnage
description: "On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. +{card.AddedPower} Power for each destroyed.",
chinese_description: 揭示：删去你在此区域的其他卡牌，每删去1张，战力+2。

name: Cerebro
description: "Ongoing: Your highest-Power cards have +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 持续：你所有战力最高的卡牌战力+2。

name: Cloak
description: "On Reveal: Next turn, both players can move cards to this location.",
chinese_description: 揭示：下回合，双方均可将卡牌移动至此区域。

name: Colleen Wing
description: "On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：丢弃你手牌中能量消耗最低的卡牌。

name: Colossus
description: "Ongoing: Can't be destroyed, moved, or have its Power reduced.",
chinese_description: 持续：不会被删去、移动，战力也不会减少。

name: Cosmo
description: "Ongoing: On Reveal abilities won't happen here.",
chinese_description: 持续：此区域揭示效果不会触发。

name: Crossbones
description: "You can only play this at locations where you are winning.",
chinese_description: 仅可在领先区域放置此卡牌。

name: Crystal
description: "On Reveal: Each player\ndraws a card.",
chinese_description: 揭示：双方各抽1张牌。

name: Cyclops
description: "\"Let's move, X-Men.\"",
chinese_description: “X战警，出发。”

name: Dagger
description: "When this moves to a location,\n+{card.AddedPower} Power for each enemy card there.",
chinese_description: 当此牌移动至一个区域时，该区域每有1张敌方卡牌，战力+3。

name: Daredevil
description: "On turn 5, you get to see your opponent's plays before you\nmake your own.",
chinese_description: 在第5回合，你在进行操作前可以先观看对手的操作。

name: Darkhawk
description: "Ongoing: +{card.AddedPower} Power for each card in your opponent's deck.",
chinese_description: 持续：对手卡组中每有1张卡牌，战力+2。

name: Dazzler
description: "Ongoing: +{card.AddedPower} Power for each location that's full on your side.",
chinese_description: 持续：你每有一个已填满的区域，此卡牌战力+2。

name: Deadpool
description: "When this is destroyed, return it to your hand with double the Power.",
chinese_description: 此牌被删去时战力翻倍，并返回到你的手牌。

name: Death
description: "Costs {card.ReducedCost} less for each card destroyed this game.",
chinese_description: 本局对战中每有1张卡牌被删去，能量消耗-1。

name: Deathlok
description: "On Reveal: Destroy your\nother cards here.",
chinese_description: 揭示：删去你在此区域的其他卡牌。

name: Debrii
description: "On Reveal: Add a {card.Card_Token.Name} to each other location, for both players.",
chinese_description: 揭示：为双方在其他区域中各添加1张石块。

name: Destroyer
description: On Reveal: Destroy your cards at other locations.
chinese_description: 揭示：删去你在其他区域的卡牌。

name: Devil Dinosaur
description: "Ongoing: +{card.AddedPower} Power for each card in your hand.",
chinese_description: 持续：你每有1张手牌，战力+2。

name: Doctor Octopus
description: "On Reveal: Pull {card.SummonCount} cards from your opponent's hand to their side\nof this location.",
chinese_description: 揭示：从对手手牌中随机抽取4张卡牌添加到对手此区域。

name: Doctor Strange
description: "On Reveal: Move your highest-Power card(s) to this location.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将你所有战力最高的卡牌移动至此区域。

name: Domino
description: "You always draw this card on turn {card.TurnNumber}, and not before.",
chinese_description: 你只能在第2回合抽到此牌。

name: Dracula
description: "At the end of the game, discard a card from your hand to gain its Power.",
chinese_description: 对战结束时，从你的手牌中丢弃1张卡牌，此牌获得其战力。

name: Drax
description: "On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：若对手本回合在此区域放置了卡牌，战力+4。

name: Doctor Doom
description: "On Reveal: Add a {card.Card_Token.Power}-Power {card.Card_Token.Name} to each other location.",
chinese_description: 揭示：在其他区域中各添加1张战力为5的毁灭机器人。

name: Ebony Maw
description: "You can't play this after turn {card.TurnNumber}.\nOngoing: You can't play cards here.",
chinese_description: 第3回合后不可放置此卡牌。持续：你不可在此区域放置卡牌。

name: Electro
description: "On Reveal: +{card.AddedMaxEnergy} Max Energy. Ongoing: You can only play\n{card.StageCardsLimit} card a turn.",
chinese_description: 揭示：最大能量+1。持续：你每回合只能放置1张卡牌。

name: Elektra
description: "On Reveal: Destroy an enemy {card.TargetCardCost}-Cost card here.",
chinese_description: 揭示：删去对手此区域中1张初始能量消耗为1的卡牌。

name: Enchantress
description: "On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards here.",
chinese_description: 揭示：移除此区域内所有持续卡牌的特殊效果。

name: Falcon
description: "On Reveal: Return your {card.TargetCardCost}-Cost cards to your hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：使你场上所有初始能量消耗为1的卡牌返回手牌。

name: Forge
description: "On Reveal: Give the next card you play +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：你放置的下一张卡牌战力+2。

name: Galactus
description: "On Reveal: If you're winning this location and this is your only card here, destroy all other locations.",
chinese_description: 揭示：若你在此区域领先，且此牌是你在此区域中的唯一卡牌，摧毁其他区域。

name: Gambit
description: "On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand to destroy a random enemy card.",
chinese_description: 揭示：丢弃1张手牌，删去1张敌方卡牌。

name: Gamora
description: "On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：若对手本回合在此区域放置了卡牌，战力+4。

name: Ghost
description: "Ongoing: Your cards are always revealed last. (Their On Reveal abilities happen last.)",
chinese_description: 持续：你的卡牌始终会后手揭示。（卡牌的揭示效果会在对手之后触发。）

name: Ghost Rider
description: "On Reveal: Bring back one of your discarded cards to this location.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将你丢弃的1张卡牌放回此区域。

name: Giganto
description: "You can only play this at the left location.",
chinese_description: <nobr>你只能将此卡牌放置在左侧区域。</nobr>

name: Goose
description: "Ongoing: Nobody can play cards that cost {card.TargetCardCost_1}, {card.TargetCardCost_2}, or {card.TargetCardCost_3} here.",
chinese_description: 持续：双方不可在此区域放置能量消耗为4、5或6的卡牌。

name: Green Goblin
description: "On Reveal: Switch sides.",
chinese_description: 揭示：此牌换边。

name: Groot
description: "On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：若对手本回合在此区域放置了卡牌，战力+4。

name: Hawkeye
description: "On Reveal: If you play a card at this location next turn, +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：若你下回合在此区域放置了卡牌，战力+3。

name: Hazmat
description: "On Reveal: Afflict all other cards with -{card.ReducedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：使所有其他卡牌战力-1。

name: Heimdall
description: On Reveal: Move your other cards one location to the left.
chinese_description: 揭示：将你的其他卡牌向左移动一个区域。

name: Hela
description: "On Reveal: Resurrect all cards you discarded to random locations.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将所有丢弃的卡牌重生至随机区域。

name: Helicarrier
description: "When you discard this, fill your hand with random cards.",
chinese_description: 丢弃此牌后，用随机卡牌填满你的手牌。

name: Hellcow
description: "On Reveal: Discard {card.DiscardCount} cards from your hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：丢弃2张手牌。

name: High Evolutionary
description: "At the start of the game, unlock the potential of your cards with no abilities.",
chinese_description: 对战开始时，解锁你无特殊效果的卡牌的潜力。

name: Hit-Monkey
description: "On Reveal: Gain +{card.AddedPower} Power for each other card you played this turn.",
chinese_description: 揭示：此回合你每放置1张其他卡牌，战力+2。

name: Hobgoblin
description: "On Reveal: Switch sides.",
chinese_description: 揭示：此牌换边。

name: The Hood
description: "On Reveal: Add a {card.Card_Token.Name} to your hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将1张恶魔添加到你的手牌。

name: Howard the Duck
description: "Ongoing: Tap this to see the top card of your deck.",
chinese_description: 持续：点击此卡来查看你卡组中最上方的卡牌。

name: Hulk
description: "\"HULK SMASH!\"",
chinese_description: “浩克猛砸！”

name: Hulkbuster
description: "On Reveal: Merge this with one of your cards here.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将此牌与你在此区域的1张随机友方卡牌融合。

name: Human Torch
description: "When this moves, double\nits Power.",
chinese_description: 此卡牌移动时，战力翻倍。

name: Iceman
description: "On Reveal: Give a card in your opponent's hand +{card.AddedCost} Cost.\n(maximum {card.MaximumCost})",
chinese_description: 揭示：使对手1张手牌能量消耗+1（最高为6）。

name: The Infinaut
description: "If you played a card last turn, you can't play this.",
chinese_description: 若你在上个回合中放置了卡牌，则无法放置此卡牌。

name: Invisible Woman
description: "Ongoing: Cards you play here are not revealed until the game ends.",
chinese_description: 持续：你在此区域放置的卡牌在对战结束之前不会揭开。

name: Iron Fist
description: "On Reveal: After you play your next card, move it one location to the left.",
chinese_description: 揭示：在你放置下一张牌后，将其向左移动一个区域。

name: Ironheart
description: "On Reveal: Give {card.ModifiedCardCount} of your other cards +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：使你其他2张卡牌战力+3。

name: Iron Lad
description: "On Reveal: Copy the text of your deck's top card.",
chinese_description: 揭示：复制你卡组中最上方卡牌的卡面文字。

name: Iron Man
description: "Ongoing: Your total Power\nis doubled here.",
chinese_description: 持续：你在此区域的总战力翻倍。

name: Jane Foster Mighty Thor
description: "On Reveal: Draw all cards that Cost {card.TargetCardCost} from your deck.",
chinese_description: 揭示：从你的卡组中抽取所有能量消耗为0的卡牌。

name: Jeff the Baby Land Shark
description: "You can move this once. Nothing can stop you from moving or playing this to any location.",
chinese_description: 你可以移动此卡牌1次。没什么能阻止你将此牌移动或放置到任意区域。

name: Jessica Jones
description: "On Reveal: If you don't play a card at this location next turn, +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：若你下回合未在此区域放置卡牌，战力+4。

name: Jubilee
description: "On Reveal: Add the top card of your deck to this location.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将你卡组中最上方的卡牌添加至此区域。

name: Juggernaut
description: "On Reveal: Move away all enemy cards played here this turn. (including unrevealed cards)",
chinese_description: 揭示：若对手本回合在此区域放置了卡牌，则将它们移动到随机区域。（包括未揭示的卡牌）

name: Kang
description: "On Reveal: Look at what your opponent did, then restart the turn. (without this)",
chinese_description: 揭示：检视对手的操作，然后重新开始此回合（此牌会消失）。

name: Ka-Zar
description: "Ongoing: Your {card.TargetCardCost}-Cost cards have +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 持续：你所有的初始能量消耗为1的卡牌战力+1。

name: Killmonger
description: "On Reveal: Destroy ALL\n{card.TargetCardCost}-Cost cards.",
chinese_description: 揭示：删去所有初始能量消耗为1的卡牌。

name: Kingpin
description: "When an enemy card moves here, afflict it with -{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 当有敌方卡牌移动到此区域时，使其战力-2。

name: Kitty Pryde
description: "When this returns to your hand,\n+{card.AddedPower} Power. Returns at the start\nof each turn.",
chinese_description: 当此卡牌回到手牌时，战力+1；每回合开始时会返回手牌。

name: Klaw
description: "Ongoing: The location to the right has +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 持续：所在区域右侧区域战力+6。

name: Knull
description: "Ongoing: Has the combined Power of all cards destroyed this game.",
chinese_description: 持续：此牌战力为本局对战中所有被删去卡牌的战力之和。

name: Korg
description: "On Reveal: Shuffle a {card.Card_Token.Name} into your opponent's deck.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将1张石块洗进对手卡组。

name: Kraven
description: "When a card moves here, this gains +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 每当有卡牌移动至本区域，此卡牌战力+2。

name: Lady Sif
description: "On Reveal: Discard the highest-cost card from your hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：丢弃你手牌中能量消耗最高的卡牌。

name: Leader
description: "On Reveal: Copy the enemy card(s) with the highest Power played this turn, but on your side.",
chinese_description: 揭示：复制对手在此回合放置的战力最高的牌，并添加至你对应的区域。

name: Leech
description: On Reveal: Remove the text from 6-Cost cards in your opponent's hand.
chinese_description: 揭示：移除对手手牌中初始能量消耗为6的卡牌的文本。

name: The Living Tribunal
description: "Ongoing: Split your total Power evenly among all locations.",
chinese_description: 持续：将我方的总战力平分给所有区域。

name: Lizard
description: "Ongoing: -{card.ReducedPower} Power if your opponent has {card.LocationCardCount} cards here.",
chinese_description: 持续：若对手在此区域有4张卡牌，战力-4。

name: Lockjaw
description: After you play a card here, swap it with a card in your deck.
chinese_description: 你在此区域放置1张卡牌后，将其随机替换为你卡组中的1张卡牌。

name: Luke Cage
description: "Ongoing: Your cards can't have their Power reduced.",
chinese_description: 持续：你的卡牌无法被降低战力。

name: Magik
description: "On Reveal: Replace this location with '{card.Location_Morphed.Name}'. Doesn't work\nafter turn {card.TurnNumber}.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将此区域替换为“地狱边境”。 此效果在第5回合后无效。

name: Magneto
description: "On Reveal: Move all enemy\n{card.TargetCardCost_1} and {card.TargetCardCost_2}-Cost cards to this location.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将对手所有初始能量消耗为3和4的卡牌移动至此区域。

name: Mantis
description: "On Reveal: If your opponent played any cards here this turn, copy one of them into your hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：若对手此回合在此区域放置了卡牌，则复制其中1张加入你的手牌。

name: Maria Hill
description: "On Reveal: Add a random {card.TokenEnergyCost}-Cost card to your hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：随机将1张初始能量消耗为2的卡牌添加到手牌。

name: Master Mold
description: "On Reveal: Add {card.TokenCount} {card.Card_Token.Name} to your opponent's hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将2张机械卫兵添加到对手手牌。

name: Maximus
description: "On Reveal: Your opponent\ndraws {card.DrawCount} cards.",
chinese_description: 揭示：对手抽2张牌。

name: M'Baku
description: "At the end of the game, this jumps from your deck to your lowest-Power location. (that isn't full)",
chinese_description: 对战结束时，此牌从你的卡组跳出并添加到你<i>（没有填满的区域里）<i>战力最低的区域。

name: Medusa
description: "On Reveal: If this is at the middle location, +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：若此卡牌在中间区域，战力+3。

name: Miles Morales
description: "If a card moved last turn, this costs {card.AssignedCost}.",
chinese_description: 若上个回合有卡牌移动过，此卡牌的能量消耗变为1。

name: Misty Knight
description: "\"We've got to save this city.\"",
chinese_description: “这座城市需要我们来拯救。”

name: M.O.D.O.K.
description: "On Reveal: Discard your hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：丢弃你的手牌。

name: Mojo
description: "Ongoing: If both sides here are full, +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 持续：若双方均将此区域填满，战力+6。

name: Moon Girl
description:
On Reveal: Duplicate
your hand.
chinese_description: 揭示：复制你的手牌。

name: Moon Knight
description: "On Reveal: Discard a card from each player's hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：双方各丢弃1张手牌。

name: Morbius
description: "Ongoing: +{card.AddedPower} Power for each time you discarded a card this game.",
chinese_description: 持续：本局对战中你每丢弃1张卡牌，战力+2。

name: Morph
description: "On Reveal: Become a copy of a card in your opponent's hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：变为对手手牌中1张卡牌的复制牌。

name: MrFantastic
description: Ongoing: Adjacent locations have +2 Power.
chinese_description: 持续：相邻区域战力+3。

name: Mister Negative
description: "On Reveal: Swap the Power and Cost of all cards in your deck.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将卡组中所有卡牌的能量消耗与战力互换。

name: Mister Sinister
description: "On Reveal: Add a {card.Card_Token.Name} here with the same Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：在此区域添加1张相同战力的惊恶克隆体。

name: Multiple Man
description: "When this moves, add a copy to the old location.",
chinese_description: 此卡牌移动后，在原区域添加1张它的复制牌。

name: Mysterio
description: "As you play this, play Illusions to other locations. Disguise this as an Illusion until the game ends.",
chinese_description: 当你放置此卡牌时，在其他区域中放置“幻觉”，并将此牌伪装成“幻觉”直至对战结束。

name: Mystique
description: "On Reveal: If the last card you played has an Ongoing, copy its text. (if it's in play)",
chinese_description: 揭示：若你放置的上张卡牌有持续效果，复制其卡面文字。（若该卡牌在场上已揭示）

name: Nakia
description: "On Reveal: Give all cards in your hand +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：使你所有手牌战力+1。

name: Namor
description: "Ongoing: +{card.AddedPower} Power if this is your only card here.",
chinese_description: 持续：若此卡牌是你在此区域中的唯一卡牌，战力+5。

name: Nebula
description: "Each turn your opponent doesn't play a card here, +{card.AddedPower} Power. (except the turn you play this)",
chinese_description: 每回合，若你的对手未在此区域放置卡牌，战力+2。（你放置此卡牌的回合除外）

name: Negasonic Teenage Warhead
description: After an enemy card is played here, destroy it. (once per game)
chinese_description: 在1张敌方卡牌被放置到此区域后，删去那张卡牌。<i>（每局限1次）<i>

name: Nick Fury
description: "On Reveal: Add {card.TokenCount} random\n{card.TokenEnergyCost}-Cost cards to your hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：随机将3张初始能量消耗为6的卡牌添加到手牌。

name: Nightcrawler
description: "You can move this once.",
chinese_description: 你可移动此牌1次。

name: Nimrod
description: "When this is destroyed, add a copy to each other location.",
chinese_description: 被删去时，在其他区域中各添加1张此卡牌的复制牌。

name: Nova
description: "When this is destroyed, give your cards +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 此卡牌被删去时，你的所有卡牌战力+1。

name: Odin
description: "On Reveal: Activate the On Reveal abilities of your other cards here.",
chinese_description: 揭示：触发此区域你其他卡牌的揭示效果。

name: Okoye
description: On Reveal: Give every card in your deck +1 Power.
chinese_description: 揭示：使你卡组中所有卡牌战力+1。

name: Omega Red
description: "Ongoing: If you're winning here, +{card.AddedPower} Power to other locations.",
chinese_description: 持续：若你在此区域领先，使其他各区域战力+3。

name: Onslaught
description: "Ongoing: Double your other Ongoing effects here.",
chinese_description: 持续：此区域中你的其他持续效果翻倍。

name: Orka
description: "Ongoing: +{card.AddedPower} Power if this is your only card here.",
chinese_description: 持续：若此卡牌是你在此区域中的唯一卡牌，战力+5。

name: Patriot
description: "Ongoing: Your cards with no abilities have +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 持续：你的没有特殊效果的卡牌战力+2。

name: Polaris
description: "On Reveal: Move an enemy\n{card.TargetCardCost_1} or {card.TargetCardCost_2}-Cost card to this location.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将1张敌方初始能量消耗为1或2的卡牌移动至此区域。

name: Professor X
description: "Ongoing: Lock down this location. (Cards can't be added, removed, etc.)",
chinese_description: 持续：锁定此区域。（不可在此区域添加、移除卡牌等。）

name: Psylocke
description: "On Reveal: Next turn, you get +{card.AddedEnergy} Energy.",
chinese_description: 揭示：下一回合，能量+1。

name: Punisher
description: "Ongoing: +{card.AddedPower} Power for each enemy card here.",
chinese_description: 持续：在此区域每有1张敌方卡牌，战力+1。

name: Quake
description: "On Reveal: Swap the positions of the other two locations.",
chinese_description: 揭示：另外2个区域交换位置。

name: Quicksilver
description: "Starts in your opening hand.",
chinese_description: 必定出现于起始手牌中。

name: Quinjet
description: "Ongoing: Cards that didn't start in your deck cost {card.ReducedCost} less. (minimum 1)",
chinese_description: 持续：对战开始时不在你卡组中的卡牌能量消耗-1。（最低为1）

name: Red Skull
description: "Ongoing: Enemy cards here have +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 持续：此区域的敌方卡牌战力+2。

name: Rescue
description: "On Reveal: If you play a card at this location next turn, +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：若你下回合在此区域放置了卡牌，战力+5。

name: Rhino
description: "On Reveal: Ruin this location. (remove its ability)",
chinese_description: 揭示：将此区域变为废墟。（移除区域特殊效果）

name: Rocket Raccoon
description: "On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：若对手本回合在此区域放置了卡牌，战力+4。

name: Rockslide
description: "On Reveal: Shuffle {card.TokenCount} Rocks into your opponent's deck.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将2张石块洗入对手卡组。

name: Rogue
description: "On Reveal: Steal the text from an enemy Ongoing card here.",
chinese_description: 揭示：偷取此区域随机1张敌方持续卡牌的效果文字。

name: Ronan the Accuser
description: "Ongoing: +{card.AddedPower} Power for each card in your opponent's hand.",
chinese_description: 持续：对手每有1张手牌，战力+2。

name: Sabretooth
description: "When this is destroyed, return it to your hand. It costs {card.AssignedCost}.",
chinese_description: 此卡牌被删去时会返回到你的手牌，能量消耗变为0。

name: Sandman
description: On Reveal: Players can only play 1 card next turn.
chinese_description: 揭示：双方下回合只可放置1张卡牌。

name: Sauron
description: "On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards in your\nhand and deck.",
chinese_description: 揭示：移除你手牌和卡组中所有持续卡牌的特殊效果。

name: Scarlet Witch
description: "On Reveal: Replace this location with a new one.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将此区域替换成一个新区域。

name: Scorpion
description: "On Reveal: Afflict cards in your opponent's hand with -{card.ReducedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：使对手所有手牌战力-1。

name: Sentinel
description: "On Reveal: Add another Sentinel to your hand.";
chinese_description: 揭示：将另一张机械卫兵添加到你的手牌。

name: Sentry
description: "You can't play this at the right location.\nOn Reveal: Add a {card.Card_Token.Power} Power Void to the right location.",
chinese_description: 此卡牌无法放置在右侧区域。 揭示：向右侧区域添加1张战力为-8的虚无。

name: Sera
description: "Ongoing: Cards in your hand cost {card.ReducedCost} less. (minimum 1)",
chinese_description: 持续：你所有手牌能量消耗-1。（最低为1）。

name: Shadow King
description: "On Reveal: Set all cards here to their base Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：使此区域所有卡牌的战力变为初始基础值。

name: Shang-Chi
description: "On Reveal: Destroy all enemy cards here that have {card.TargetCardCost} or more Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：删去在此区域中所有战力大于或等于10的敌方卡牌。

name: Shanna
description: "On Reveal: Add a random\n{card.TokenEnergyCost}-Cost card to each location.",
chinese_description: 揭示：随机将1张初始能量消耗为1的卡牌添加到每个区域。

name: She-Hulk
description: "Costs {card.ReducedCost} less for each unspent Energy last turn.",
chinese_description: 上回合每有一点未消耗的能量，该牌能量消耗-1。

name: Shocker
description: "\"I'm gonna blast you!\"",
chinese_description: “我要震爆你们！”

name: Shuri
description: "On Reveal: If you play your next card at this location, double its Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：若你的下一张卡牌放置在此区域，使其战力翻倍。

name: Silver Surfer
description: "On Reveal: Give your other\n{card.TargetCardCost}-Cost cards +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：你其他初始能量消耗为3的卡牌战力+2。

name: Snowguard
description: "On Reveal: Add the Hawk and Bear auroras to your hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将1张雪守卫（鹰）和1张雪守卫（熊）加入手牌。

name: Spectrum
description: On Reveal: Give your Ongoing cards +2 Power.
chinese_description: 揭示：你所有的持续卡牌战力+2。

name: Spider-Man
description: "On Reveal: Move to another location and pull an enemy card from\nhere to there.",
chinese_description: 揭示：移动至另一区域，并将此区域中的1张敌方卡牌也移至该区域。

name: Spider-Woman
description: "On Reveal: Afflict all enemy cards here with -{card.ReducedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：使此区域所有敌方卡牌战力-1。

name: Squirrel Girl
description: "On Reveal: Add a {card.Card_Token.Power}-Power {card.Card_Token.Name} to each other location.",
chinese_description: 揭示：在其他区域中各添加1张战力为1的松鼠。

name: Star-Lord
description: "On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：若对手本回合在此区域放置了卡牌，战力+4。

name: Stature
description: "Costs {card.AssignedCost} if your opponent discarded a card this game.",
chinese_description: 若对手在本局对战中丢弃过卡牌，此牌的能量消耗变为1。

name: Stegron
description: "On Reveal: Move an enemy card from here to another location.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将此区域中的1张敌方卡牌移至其他区域。

name: Storm
description: "On Reveal: Flood this location. Next turn is the last turn cards can\nbe played here.",
chinese_description: 揭示：冲毁此区域。下回合过后，双方不可在此区域放置卡牌。

name: Strong Guy
description: "Ongoing: +{card.AddedPower} Power if your hand has {card.TokenCount} or fewer cards.",
chinese_description: 持续：若你的手牌数量小于或等于6，此牌战力+1。

name: Sunspot
description: "After each turn, gain +{card.AddedPower} Power for each unspent Energy.",
chinese_description: 每回合结束后，每有1点未消耗的能量，战力+1。

name: Super-Skrull
description: "Ongoing: Has the Ongoing effects of all enemy cards.",
chinese_description: 持续：拥有所有敌方卡牌的持续效果。

name: Swarm
description: "When you discard this, add two copies that cost {card.TokenEnergyCost} to your hand.",
chinese_description: 当你丢弃此牌时，将2张它的复制牌添加到手牌，它们的能量消耗为0。

name: Sword Master
description: "On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：丢弃1张手牌。

name: Taskmaster
description: "On Reveal: Set this card鈥檚 Power equal to that of the last card you played. (if that card's in play)",
chinese_description: 揭示：将此卡牌的战力设置为与你放置的上张卡牌的战力相等。（若该卡牌在场上已揭示）

name: Thanos
description: "Starts in your opening hand and shuffles the six Infinity Stones\ninto your deck.",
chinese_description: 此牌会出现在你的起始手牌中，并将六张无限宝石洗进你的卡组。

name: The Collector
description: "When a card enters your hand from anywhere (except your deck),\n+{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 每当有卡牌从任意位置（你的卡组除外）添加到你的手牌，此卡战力+1。

name: The Thing
description: "\"It's clobberin' time!\"",
chinese_description: “痛扁时间到！”

name: Thor
description: "On Reveal: Shuffle Mjolnir into your deck.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将雷神之锤洗进你的卡组。

name: Titania
description: "After ANY card is played here, this card switches sides.",
chinese_description: 任意卡牌被放置到此区域后，此卡牌会换边。

name: Typhoid Mary
description: "Ongoing: Your other cards\nhave -{card.ReducedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 持续：你的其他卡牌战力-1。

name: Uatu the Watcher
description: "At the start of the game, shows the right location to you.",
chinese_description: 对战开始时，向你揭示右侧区域的效果。

name: Ultron
description: "On Reveal: Deploy four {card.Card_Token.Power}-Power Drones to each other location.",
chinese_description: 揭示：在其他区域中各放置4张战力为2的奥创复制体。

name: Valkyrie
description: "On Reveal: Set ALL cards here to {card.AssignedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：将此区域中所有卡牌的战力都变为3。

name: Venom
description: "On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. Add their Power to this card.",
chinese_description: 揭示：删去此区域中你的其他卡牌，此牌获得被删去卡牌的全部战力。

name: Viper
description: "On Reveal: One of your other cards here switches sides.",
chinese_description: 揭示：你在此区域的另一张卡牌换边。

name: Vision
description: "You can move this each turn.",
chinese_description: 你每个回合均可移动此牌。

name: Vulture
description: "When this card moves,\n+{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 此卡牌移动时，战力+6。

name: Warpath
description: "Ongoing: If any of your locations are empty, +{card.AddedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 持续：若你有空置区域，战力+5。

name: Wasp
description: "\"My secret power is that I get things done.\"",
chinese_description: “我的超能力是解决问题。”

name: Wave
description: "On Reveal: All cards cost a maximum of {card.AssignedCost} until the end\nof next turn.",
chinese_description: 揭示：下回合结束前，所有卡牌的最大能量消耗均为4。

name: White Queen
description: "On Reveal: Copy the highest-Cost card in your opponent's hand\ninto your hand.",
chinese_description: 揭示：复制对手手牌中能量消耗最高的卡牌到你的手牌。

name: White Tiger
description: "On Reveal: Add a {card.Card_Token.Power}-Power Tiger to another location.",
chinese_description: 揭示：在另一区域中添加1张战力为8的灵虎。

name: Wolfsbane
description: "On Reveal: +{card.AddedPower} Power for each other card you have here.",
chinese_description: 揭示：你在此区域每有1张其他卡牌，战力+2。

name: Wolverine
description: "When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it with +{card.AddedPower} Power at a random location.",
chinese_description: 此牌被丢弃或被删去时，重新将其添加到一个随机区域，并战力+2。

name: Wong
description: "Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities here happen twice.",
chinese_description: 持续：此区域中你的卡牌揭示效果触发2次。

name: Yellowjacket
description: "On Reveal: Afflict your other cards here with -{card.ReducedPower} Power.",
chinese_description: 揭示：使此区域中你的其他卡牌战力-1。

name: Yondu
description: "On Reveal: Destroy the lowest-Cost card in your opponent's deck.",
chinese_description: 揭示：删去对手卡组中能量消耗最低的卡牌。

name: Zabu
description: "Ongoing: Your {card.TargetCardCost}-Cost cards cost {card.ReducedCost} less. (minimum 1)",
chinese_description: 持续：你所有初始能量消耗为4的卡牌能量消耗-1。（最低为1）

name: Zero
description: "On Reveal: Remove the abilities on the next card you play.",
chinese_description: 揭示：移除你放置的下一张卡牌的特殊效果。

name: Ghost-Spider
description: On Reveal: The last card you played moves here.
chinese_description: 揭示：将你放置的上一张卡牌移动至此区域。

name: Phoenix Force
description: On Reveal: Revive one of your destroyed cards and merge with it. That card can move each turn.
chinese_description: 揭示：重置1张你被删去的卡牌，并与其融合。该卡牌每回合都可以移动。

name: Jean Grey
description: Ongoing: Players must play their first card here each turn. (if possible)
chinese_description: 持续：若可能，双方玩家每回合必须在此区域放置第1张卡牌。

name: Echo
description: After your opponent plays an Ongoing card here, remove its abilities.
chinese_description: 当对手在此区域放置1张持续效果的卡牌后，移除那张卡牌的特殊效果。

name: Legion
description: On Reveal: Replace each other location with this one.
chinese_description: 揭示：将所有其它区域替换为此区域。

name: Mirage
description: On Reveal: Copy the lowest-Cost card in your opponent's hand into your hand. Give it +{card.AddedPower} Power.
chinese_description: 揭示：复制对手手牌中能量消耗最低的卡牌到你的手牌，并使其战力+2。

name: Silk
description: After ANY card is played here, this moves to another location.
chinese_description: 任意卡牌被放置到此区域后，此卡牌会移动到另一区域。

name: Spider-Ham
description: On Reveal: Transform the leftmost card in your opponent's hand into a {card.Card_Token.Name}, keeping its Power and Cost.
chinese_description: 揭示：将对手手牌中最左边的1张卡牌变为小猪，但保留其战力与能量消耗。

name: Spider-Man 2099
description: The first time this moves to any location, destroy an enemy card there.
chinese_description: 这张卡牌首次移动至一个区域时，删去对手在此区域的1张卡牌。

name: Loki
description: On Reveal: Transform your hand into cards from your opponent's starting deck and give them -1 Cost.
chinese_description: 揭示：将你的手牌变为对手起始卡组中的卡牌，并使这些卡牌能量消耗-1。

name: Alioth
description: On Reveal: Remove the text from all unrevealed enemy cards here.
chinese_description: 揭示：移除此区域所有未揭示敌方卡牌的卡面文字。

name: RavonnaRenslayer
description: Ongoing: Your cards with 1 or less Power cost 1 less. (minimum 1)
chinese_description: 持续：你战力不高于1的卡牌能量消耗-1。（最低为1）

name: Mobius M. Mobius
description: Ongoing: Your Costs can't be increased. Your opponent's Costs can't be reduced.
chinese_description: 持续：你的能量消耗不会增加。对手的能量消耗不可减少。

name: Daken
description: On Reveal: Add the Muramasa Shard to your hand.
chinese_description: 揭示：将村正刀碎片添加到你的手牌。

name: Lady Deathstrike
description: On Reveal: Destroy each card here with 3 or less Power.
chinese_description: 揭示：删去此区域所有战力小于或等于3的卡牌。

name: X23
description: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location and you get +1 Energy next turn.
chinese_description: 此卡牌被丢弃或删去时，重新将其添加至一个随机区域，并在下一回合你的能量+1。

name: Silver Samurai
description: On Reveal: Each player discards the lowest-Power card from their hand.
chinese_description: 揭示：每位玩家各丢弃手牌中1张战力最低的卡牌。

name: MsMarvel
description: Ongoing: Your adjacent locations with 2+ cards and no repeated Costs have +5 Power.
chinese_description: 持续：若相邻区域内拥有2张或更多的卡牌，并且消耗各不相同，该相邻区域战力+5。

name: Gladiator
description: On Reveal: Add a card from your opponent's deck to their side of this location. If it has less Power, destroy it."
chinese_description: 揭示：将对手卡组内的1张卡牌添加至敌方此区域，如果其战力低于此牌，则删去该卡牌。

name: Annihilus
description: On Reveal: Your cards with {card.AssignedPower} or less Power switch sides. Destroy\nthose that can't."
chinese_description: 揭示：你战力小于或等于0的卡牌换边。若其中有卡牌无法换边，则将其删去。

name: Martyr
description: "At the end of the game, move to a location that LOSES you the\ngame. (if possible)"
chinese_description: 此牌会在本局对战结束时移动到会让你输掉对战的区域（若能输的话）。

name: Elsa Bloodstone
description: "Each card you play to fill your side of a location gains +{card.AddedPower} Power."
chinese_description: 若你放置的卡牌可填满你的任一区域，则该卡牌战力+2。

name: Man-Thing
description: "Ongoing: {card.TargetCardCost_1}, {card.TargetCardCost_2}, and {card.TargetCardCost_3}-Cost cards here have -{card.ReducedPower} Power."
chinese_description: 持续：此区域所有初始能量消耗为1、2和3的卡牌战力-2。

name: Black Knight
description: "After you discard a card, add the {card.Card_Token.Name} to your hand with that card's Power. (once per game)"
chinese_description: 丢弃1张卡牌后，将1张战力与该牌相等的乌木剑加入手牌。<i>（每局限1次）<i>

name: Nico Minoru
description: "On Reveal: After you play your next card, cast a spell. (The spell\nchanges each turn.)";
chinese_description: <b>揭示：<b>你放置下张卡牌后，释放1个法术。<i>（法术每回合都会变化）<i>
attributes:
.With(CardAttributeType.Card_Related, CardDefId.Spell01NicoMinoru)
               .With(CardAttributeType.Card_Related, CardDefId.Spell02NicoMinoru)
                .With(CardAttributeType.Card_Related, CardDefId.Spell03NicoMinoru)
        .With(CardAttributeType.Card_Related, CardDefId.Spell04NicoMinoru) 
                .With(CardAttributeType.Card_Related, CardDefId.Spell05NicoMinoru) 
                .With(CardAttributeType.Card_Related, CardDefId.Spell06NicoMinoru)
                .With(CardAttributeType.Card_Related, CardDefId.Spell07NicoMinoru),

name: Werewolf By Night
description: "After you play a card, move there to gain +{card.AddedPower} Power if it has an On Reveal."
chinese_description: 你在其他区域放置1张揭示卡牌后，此牌移动至该区域，战力+2。

name: Caiera
description: Ongoing: Your {card.TargetCardCost_1} and {card.TargetCardCost_2}-Cost cards can't be destroyed.
chinese_description: 持续：你所有初始能量消耗为1和6的卡牌均无法被删去。

name: Hercules
description: The first time another card moves here each turn, move it to another location.
chinese_description: 移动至此牌所在区域的卡牌会被移走。（每回合一次）

name: Miek
description: When you discard a card, this gains +1 Power and can move next turn.
chinese_description: 当你丢弃卡牌时，此牌战力+1，并且下回合可以移动。

name: Grand Master
description: On Reveal: Move one of your other On Reveal cards here to the middle location. Its ability happens again.
chinese_description: 揭示：将你在此区域的另1张揭示卡牌移动至中间区域，并触发其效果。

name: Beta Ray Bill
description: On Reveal: Shuffle Stormbreaker into your deck.
chinese_description: 揭示：将风暴战斧洗进你的卡组。

name: SebastianShaw
description: When this card permanently gains Power, gain +2 more Power. (wherever this is)
chinese_description: 此卡牌获得永久战力时，战力额外+2。（无论在哪里）

name: Blob
description: On Reveal: Merge cards from your deck into this until it gains 15 or more Power.
chinese_description: 揭示：将你卡组中的卡牌依序合并到此卡牌，直到其获得的战力达到15或更高。 持续：不可移动。

name: Havok
description: After each turn, you lose 1 Max Energy and this gains +4} Power.
chinese_description: 每回合结束后，你失去1点最大能量，此卡牌战力+4。

name: Selene
description: On Reveal: Afflict the lowest-Power card in each player's hand\nwith -3 Power.
chinese_description: 揭示：双方手牌中战力最低的1张卡牌战力-3。

name: Skaar
description: Costs 2 less for each of your cards that has 10 or more Power.
chinese_description: 你在场上每有1张战力不低于10的卡牌，此卡牌能量消耗-2。

name: Hope Summers
description: After you play a card here, you get +1 Energy next turn.
chinese_description: 你每在此牌所在区域放置另1张卡牌，下个回合能量+1。

name: Pixie
description: On Reveal: Shuffle the base Costs\nof all cards in your deck\nthat started there.
chinese_description: 揭示：将你起始卡组中所有卡牌（不含当前手牌）的初始能量消耗随机交换。

name: Mockingbird
description: Costs 1 less for each of your cards in play that didn't start in your deck.
chinese_description: 你已在场上揭示的卡牌中，每有1张不属于你的起始卡组，此牌能量消耗-1。

name: Cannonball
description: On Reveal: Move the highest-Power enemy card here away. If you can't, destroy it with a Rock.
chinese_description: 揭示：移走此牌所在区域敌方战力最高的卡牌。若无法移动，则将其删去，再在相同位置添加1张石块。

name: War Machine
description: On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, nothing can stop you from playing cards anywhere.
chinese_description: 揭示：下回合结束前，你可以不受限制，将卡牌放置在任何区域。

name: Black Swan
description: Activate: Until the end of next turn, your 1-Cost cards cost 0.
chinese_description: 激活：在下一回合结束前，你初始能量消耗为1的卡牌的能量消耗变为0。

name: Supergiant
description: On Reveal: All cards played next turn don't reveal until the game ends.
chinese_description: 揭示：下回合放置的所有卡牌在对战结束之前不会揭开。

name: Proxima Midnight
description: When this is discarded, jumps to your lowest-Power location. (that isn't full)
chinese_description: 此牌被丢弃时，将其添加至你战力最低的那个区域 <i>（需有空位） <i>。

name: Corvus Glaive
description: On Reveal: Discard 2 cards from your hand to get +1 Max Energy.
chinese_description: 揭示：丢弃2张手牌，你的最大能量+1。

name: Cull Obsidian
description: You can only play this where you have a 1-Cost card.
chinese_description: 你只能在已有能量消耗为1的卡牌的区域放置此卡牌。

name: Blink
description: On Reveal: Swap the last card you played with a card that costs more from your deck.
chinese_description: 揭示：将你放置的上一张卡牌，与你卡组中能量消耗高于该牌的1张牌进行互换。

name: Nocturne
description: You can move this once. When this moves, replace its location with a random new one.
chinese_description: 你可移动此牌1次。此牌移动后，将目标区域随机替换为新区域。

name: Sage
description: On Reveal: +2 Power for each different Power among all\nother cards here.
chinese_description: 揭示：此牌所在区域内其他卡牌每有1种不同的战力，此牌战力+2。

name: Namora
description: On Reveal: Give +5 Power to each of your cards alone at another location.
chinese_description: 揭示：使你每张在其他区域内单独存在的卡牌战力+5。

name: Sasquatch
description: Costs 1 less for each card you played last turn.
chinese_description: 你每在上回合放置1张卡牌，此牌能量消耗-1。

name: Baron Zemo
description: On Reveal: Recruit a card that costs the least from your opponent's deck to your side of this location.
chinese_description: 揭示：为你在此区域添加1张对手卡组中能量消耗最低的卡牌。

name: Red Hulk
description: When your opponent ends a turn with unspent Energy, +4 Power.\n(if in hand or in play)
chinese_description: 如果对手回合结束时仍有未消耗的能量，此牌战力+4。（若已在手牌中或已在场上揭示）

name: US Agent
description: Ongoing: 4, 5, and 6-Cost cards here have -4 Power.
chinese_description: 持续：此牌所在区域中所有初始能量消耗为4、5和6的卡牌战力-4。

name: Red Guardian
description: On Reveal: Afflict the lowest-Power enemy card here with -2 Power and remove its text.
chinese_description: 揭示：使此区域战力最低的敌方卡牌战力-2，并移除其卡面文字。

name: White Widow
description: On Reveal: Add a WidowsKiss to your opponent's side of this location.
chinese_description: 揭示：将1张寡妇之吻添加至敌方此区域。

name: Widows Kiss
description: Ongoing: This has -4 Power. Disable this ability if your side of this location is full.
chinese_description: 持续：此牌战力-4。若你已填满此区域，则此特殊效果无效。

name: Valentina
description: On Reveal: Add a random 3-Cost card to your hand. Give it -2 Cost\nand -3 Power.
chinese_description: 揭示：随机将1张初始能量消耗为6的卡牌添加到手牌。使该卡牌能量消耗-2，并且战力-3。
